title: LP gains
body: im winning alot more than im losing and get 10 win streaks and shit.. been in d3 promos twice. Why am i gaining shit like 15 lp a game when im vs challengers every game, it makes no sense..

replies.body:
Hmmm...

Your last match you played against the following ranks;

Diamond 3
Challenger 1 113 LP
Diamond 2
Diamond 5
Diamond 5

And in your last 10 games you have faced various plats. Your MMR is good, but not a lot better than the average diamond 4 or 5 player.
Your MMR is below where you belong that's why, this has been explained why a million times over for years now yet people like you still make useless threads like this.
yet it says im normal.. right o. and if my mmr was trash id be against plats and %%%%. not challengers
